Sentencas: The economic and technical breakthroughs in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) for commercial success still depend on high-quality manufacture, reliability, efficiency, and must have an acceptable cost when compared to competing technologies.
Titulo: Flame-Based Technologies and Reactive Spray Deposition Technology for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Technical and Economic Aspects

Sentencas: The application of flame-based technologies as a one-step deposition technique for SOFC component manufacture has potential to reduce both cost and production time.
Titulo: Flame-Based Technologies and Reactive Spray Deposition Technology for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Technical and Economic Aspects

Sentencas: In this article, cells produced by flame processes have been reviewed with emphases placed on the Reactive Spray Deposition Technology technique.
Titulo: Flame-Based Technologies and Reactive Spray Deposition Technology for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Technical and Economic Aspects

Sentencas: Various experimental methods and examples for the synthesis of porous electrodes and dense electrolytes are reviewed.
Titulo: Flame-Based Technologies and Reactive Spray Deposition Technology for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Technical and Economic Aspects

Sentencas: The studies focus on determining the range of the flame conditions under which each of the individual cell components for low temperature SOFC applications similar to 600 A degrees C could be successfully deposited.
Titulo: Flame-Based Technologies and Reactive Spray Deposition Technology for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Technical and Economic Aspects
